verses.verse: וְיוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> ve-yo-Sef And Joseph הוּרַ֣ד <S%H3381><s%> hu-Rad was brought down מִצְרָ֑יְמָה <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-ye-mah; to Egypt וַיִּקְנֵ֡הוּ <S%H7069><s%> vai-yik-Ne-hu bought פּוֹטִיפַר֩ <S%H6318><s%> po-ti-Far and Potiphar סְרִ֨יס <S%H5631><s%> se-Ris an officer פַּרְעֹ֜ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh of Pharaoh שַׂ֤ר <S%H8269><s%> sar captain הַטַּבָּחִים֙ <S%H2876><s%> hat-tab-ba-Chim of the guard אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish an מִצְרִ֔י <S%H4713><s%> mitz-Ri, Egyptian מִיַּד֙ <S%H3027><s%> mi-Yad him of the hands הַיִּשְׁמְעֵאלִ֔ים <S%H3459><s%> hai-yish-me-'e-Lim, of the Ishmeelites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who הוֹרִדֻ֖הוּ <S%H3381><s%> ho-ri-Du-hu which had brought him down שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah. there

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi became יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- was with יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef, was with Joseph וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi became אִ֣ישׁ <S%H582><s%> 'ish another מַצְלִ֑יחַ <S%H6743><s%> matz-Li-ach; and he was a prosperous וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi became בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit and he was in the house אֲדֹנָ֖יו <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Nav of his master הַמִּצְרִֽי׃ <S%H4713><s%> ham-mitz-Ri. the Egyptian

וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar saw אֲדֹנָ֔יו <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Nav, And his master כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki that יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that the LORD אִתּ֑וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To; caused וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he עֹשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh, made all that he did יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [was] with him and that the LORD מַצְלִ֥יחַ <S%H6743><s%> matz-Li-ach to prosper בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Do. in his hand

וַיִּמְצָ֨א <S%H4672><s%> vai-yim-Tza found יוֹסֵ֥ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef And Joseph חֵ֛ן <S%H2580><s%> chen grace בְּעֵינָ֖יו <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nav in his sight וַיְשָׁ֣רֶת <S%H8334><s%> vay-Sha-ret and he served אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To; וַיַּפְקִדֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H6485><s%> vai-yaf-ki-De-hu him and he made him overseer עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over בֵּית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> bei-To, over his house וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> yesh- and all [that] he had ל֖וֹ lo נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan he put בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Do. into his hand

וַיְהִ֡י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came מֵאָז֩ <S%H227><s%> me-'Az And it came to pass from the time הִפְקִ֨יד <S%H6485><s%> hif-Kid [that] he had made him overseer אֹת֜וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To בְּבֵית֗וֹ <S%H1004><s%> be-vei-To, in his house וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al and over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher he יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> yesh- and over all that he had ל֔וֹ lo, וַיְבָ֧רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> vay-Va-rech blessed יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit house הַמִּצְרִ֖י <S%H4713><s%> ham-mitz-Ri the Egyptian's בִּגְלַ֣ל <S%H1558><s%> big-Lal sake יוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef; for Joseph's וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came בִּרְכַּ֤ת <S%H1293><s%> bir-Kat and the blessing יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher he יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> yesh- was upon all that he had ל֔וֹ lo, בַּבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> bab-Ba-yit in the house וּבַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <S%H7704><s%> u-vas-sa-Deh. and in the field

וַיַּעֲזֹ֣ב <S%H5800><s%> vai-ya-'a-Zo And he left כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- everything אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which לוֹ֮ lo בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be-yad- hand יוֹסֵף֒ <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef all that he had in Joseph's וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- did not יָדַ֤ע <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da' and he knew אִתּוֹ֙ <S%H854><s%> it-To with מְא֔וּמָה <S%H3972><s%> me-'U-mah, not ought כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- he had save הַלֶּ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> hal-Le-chem the bread אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he אוֹכֵ֑ל <S%H398><s%> o-Chel; which he did eat וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef, And Joseph יְפֵה־ <S%H3303><s%> ye-feh- [person] and well תֹ֖אַר <S%H8389><s%> To-'ar was [a] goodly וִיפֵ֥ה <S%H3303><s%> vi-Peh was handsome מַרְאֶֽה׃ <S%H4758><s%> mar-'Eh. favoured

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, came אַחַר֙ <S%H310><s%> 'a-Char And it came to pass after הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> had-de-va-Rim these things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh, these וַתִּשָּׂ֧א <S%H5375><s%> vat-tis-Sa cast אֵֽשֶׁת־ <S%H802><s%> 'e-shet- wife אֲדֹנָ֛יו <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Nav that his master's אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֵינֶ֖יהָ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nei-ha her eyes אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- at יוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef; upon Joseph וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer and she said שִׁכְבָ֥ה <S%H7901><s%> shich-Vah Lie עִמִּֽי׃ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mi. with

וַיְמָאֵ֓ן׀ <S%H3985><s%> vay-ma-'En But he refused וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> 'E-shet wife אֲדֹנָ֔יו <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Nav, unto his master's הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> hen Behold אֲדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Ni, Behold my master לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- does not יָדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da' wotteth אִתִּ֖י <S%H854><s%> 'it-Ti with מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- anything בַּבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> bab-Ba-yit; not what [is] with me in the house וְכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- he יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> yesh- all that he hath ל֖וֹ lo נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan and he hath committed בְּיָדִֽי׃ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Di. to my hand

אֵינֶ֨נּוּ <S%H369><s%> 'ei-Nen-nu There גָד֜וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol [There is] none greater בַּבַּ֣יִת <S%H1004><s%> bab-Ba-yit in this house הַזֶּה֮ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this מִמֶּנִּי֒ <S%H4480><s%> mi-men-Ni than וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- than I neither חָשַׂ֤ךְ <S%H2820><s%> cha-Sach hath he kept back מִמֶּ֙נִּי֙ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-ni than מְא֔וּמָה <S%H3972><s%> me-'U-mah, any thing כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo אוֹתָ֖ךְ <S%H853><s%> o-Tach בַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> ba-'a-Sher from me but thee because אַתְּ־ <S%H859><s%> 'at- thou אִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <S%H802><s%> ish-To; [art] his wife וְאֵ֨יךְ <S%H349><s%> ve-'Eich How אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֜ה <S%H6213><s%> 'e-'e-Seh how then can I do הָרָעָ֤ה <S%H7451><s%> ha-ra-'Ah wickedness הַגְּדֹלָה֙ <S%H1419><s%> hag-ge-do-Lah this great הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot, likewise וְחָטָ֖אתִי <S%H2398><s%> ve-cha-Ta-ti and sin לֵֽאלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> Le-lo-Him. angels

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become כְּדַבְּרָ֥הּ <S%H1696><s%> ke-dab-be-Rah And it came to pass as she spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef to Joseph י֣וֹם׀ <S%H3117><s%> Yom day י֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom; by day וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- did not שָׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma' that he hearkened אֵלֶ֛יהָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-ha to her לִשְׁכַּ֥ב <S%H7901><s%> lish-Kav not unto her to lie אֶצְלָ֖הּ <S%H681><s%> 'etz-Lah by her לִהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> lih-Yot become עִמָּֽהּ׃ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mah. now it

וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi happened כְּהַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> ke-hai-Yom And it came to pass about this time הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, one וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo that [Joseph] went הַבַּ֖יְתָה <S%H1004><s%> hab-Bay-tah into the house לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot to do מְלַאכְתּ֑וֹ <S%H4399><s%> me-lach-To; his business וְאֵ֨ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein else אִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish of the men מֵאַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> me-'an-Shei of the men הַבַּ֛יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit of the house שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> sham was there בַּבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> bab-Ba-yit. inside

וַתִּתְפְּשֵׂ֧הוּ <S%H8610><s%> vat-tit-pe-Se-hu And she caught בְּבִגְד֛וֹ <S%H899><s%> be-vig-Do him by his garment לֵאמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor saying שִׁכְבָ֣ה <S%H7901><s%> shich-Vah Lie עִמִּ֑י <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mi; and he וַיַּעֲזֹ֤ב <S%H5800><s%> vai-ya-'a-Zo with me and he left בִּגְדוֹ֙ <S%H899><s%> big-Do his garment בְּיָדָ֔הּ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Dah, in her hand וַיָּ֖נָס <S%H5127><s%> vai-Ya-nos and fled וַיֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze and got הַחֽוּצָה׃ <S%H2351><s%> ha-Chu-tzah. him out

וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become כִּרְאוֹתָ֔הּ <S%H7200><s%> kir-'o-Tah, And it came to pass when she saw כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for עָזַ֥ב <S%H5800><s%> 'a-Zav that he had left בִּגְד֖וֹ <S%H899><s%> big-Do his garment בְּיָדָ֑הּ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Dah; in her hand וַיָּ֖נָס <S%H5127><s%> vai-Ya-nos and was fled הַחֽוּצָה׃ <S%H2351><s%> ha-Chu-tzah. forth

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become כְשָׁמְע֔וֹ <S%H8085><s%> che-sha-me-'O, And it came to pass when he heard כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for הֲרִימֹ֥תִי <S%H7311><s%> ha-ri-Mo-ti that I lifted up קוֹלִ֖י <S%H6963><s%> ko-Li my voice וָאֶקְרָ֑א <S%H7121><s%> va-'ek-Ra; and cried וַיַּעֲזֹ֤ב <S%H5800><s%> vai-ya-'a-Zo that he left בִּגְדוֹ֙ <S%H899><s%> big-Do his garment אֶצְלִ֔י <S%H681><s%> 'etz-Li, with me וַיָּ֖נָס <S%H5127><s%> vai-Ya-nos and fled וַיֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze and got him הַחֽוּצָה׃ <S%H2351><s%> ha-Chu-tzah. out

וַתַּנַּ֥ח <S%H3240><s%> vat-tan-Nach And she laid up בִּגְד֖וֹ <S%H899><s%> big-Do his garment אֶצְלָ֑הּ <S%H681><s%> 'etz-Lah; by her עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- her until בּ֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> Bo came אֲדֹנָ֖יו <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Nav until his lord אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about בֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1004><s%> bei-To. home
